name: WEAPON SWITCH
description:
THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR THE GEOJAM 2021.2
The theme is switch
It a wave based shooter and you play as a diamond, survive as long as you can. but the catch is you cant pick up health or weapons, you use your enemies for that, Enemies can be used as weapons and doing so give you health.

controls

LMB to shoot
WASD to move
E to posses an enemy
Q to discard the enemy

PLEASE ENJOY AND ALSO CHECK OUT KILLER SHAPES ON MY PROFILE, ITS A WAY BETTER GAME MECHANICALLY

Majority of the budget which is a staggering $0.00 USD went into making the effects😅
